chatclearplus.midnightconfig.title: ChatClear+ Configuration
chatclearplus.midnightconfig.amountToTri: Amount of messages to trigger chat clear
chatclearplus.midnightconfig.chatCleared: The message to show when chat is cleared

For the setting above you can set it blank to disable it.
Read https://minecraft.wiki/w/Formatting_codes for a list of formatting codes (Use & instead the section sign/symbol)
